ROOT.QUERY: with store_missing_total as ( select ecdsite "Store", LISTAGG(ecdcexcde, '', '') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY ecdcexcde) "PO #", foucnuf || '' | '' || foulibl "Vendor code desc", ecdnfilf "Address chain", fccnum || '' | '' || fcclib "Commercial #", to_char(ecddenvoi,''MM/DD/RR'') "Sending date", sum(pcdmont) "Total amount" from cdeentcde@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, foudgene@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, cdepied@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD, fouccom@HEINENS_CUSTOM_PROD where ecdcfin=foucfin and ecdccin=fccccin and foucnuf=''08531'' and ecdnfilf=1 and ecdcincde=pcdcincde and trunc(ecddenvoi)=trunc(sysdate) and pcdrubr=1 group by ecdsite, foucnuf, foulibl, ecdnfilf, fccnum, fcclib, ecddenvoi ) select * from store_missing_total
